sentence.Network_en: Such attitudes are valueless unless they reflect inner cognition and certainty.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种态度如果不能反映内心的认知和把握就毫无价值。

sentence.Network_en: His grandeurs were stricken valueless ; they seemed to fall away from him like rotten rags.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的荣华一下子变得一钱不值,好像一些碎布片似的从他身上脱落下去了.

sentence.Network_en: To the barbarian of the lower stage a slave was valueless.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于低级阶段的野蛮人来说,奴隶是没有价值的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念英语二册Too late ... priceless adj. 没有价格的, 无价的 valueless adj. 没有价值, 不足道的 worthless adj. 无价值的.
valued 贵重的valueless 不足道的valuer 评价者
...利用规制而失去了合理的经济利用(reasonable economic use)的可能性，完全成为“无价值”(valueless)的东西。
牛津大学英语词典 ... （装衣物等的）皮制小旅行包. Valium （房地产等的）估价人. valueless 不道德地利用（男子）或与之调情. vam…

list.abs: these paintings have been ruined and are now valueless ., 这些油画都已毁坏 , 所以现在就无价值了.
financial markets inherently have a certain extent of risk . investment values may experience upward or downward movements and may even become valueless .金融市场具一定风险，投资价格可升可跌甚至变成毫无价值。
a showy decoration that is basically valueless ., 基本上没有价值的一个浮华的装饰品.
medium-sized birch of eastern America having white or pale gray bark and valueless wood ; occurs often as a second-browth forest tree .北美东部的一种中等大小的桦树，具有灰色或白色树皮，木材无价值；次生林中常见。

entry.tran: 无价值的;无用的;无效的
entry.def: If you describe something as valueless, you mean that it is not at all useful.

example.ex: Such attitudes are valueless unless they reflect inner cognition and certainty.
example.tran: 这种态度如果不能反映内心的认知和把握就毫无价值。

auth_sentence.content: Take themsthey are to me valueless trinkets.
auth_sentence.res_content: Take themsthey are to me valueless trinkets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Take themsthey are to me valueless trinkets.

auth_sentence.content: Their making a statement as regards quantum mechanics would be just as valueless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their making a statement as regards quantum mechanics would be just as valueless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their making a statement as regards quantum mechanics would be just as valueless.

auth_sentence.content: One would not have to touch a page of the IRS code to render all write-offs, deductions and carry-forwards instantly valueless.
auth_sentence.res_content: One would not have to touch a page of the IRS code to render all write-offs, deductions and carry-forwards instantly valueless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One would not have to touch a page of the IRS code to render all write-offs, deductions and carry-forwards instantly valueless.

stems_affixes.word_buile: bound边界+less无……的→adj.无限的,无边无际的
care关心+less无……的,不……的→不关心→粗心的,疏忽的
color颜色+less无……的,不……的→adj.无色的
doubt怀疑+less无……的,不……的→adj. 无疑的,确定的
effort努力+less无……的,不……的→adj.不费力的
fathom测量深度;长度单位[6英尺]+less无……的,不……的→没法测量→深不可测的

grace优美,文雅+less无……的,不……的→adj.粗俗的

home家+less无……的,不……的→adj.无家可归的
